project.description:
cSync SCM build scripts, help files and other files as needed for packaging.
Retrieve tar.gz files from UI and RR build.
Extract TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz, ResultsReporter.tar.gz UI and RR tar.gz files to bin/release folder.
Retrieve TestCenter_WebHelp.tar.gz, Provisioning_WebHelp.tar.gz, ServerManager_WebHelp.tar.gz from webhelp build.
Run setver.py to set the version of the TestCenter binary files.
Run ci_packageinstaller.pl to create P2_installer and FORTHOT installer files.
Run ci_packageinstaller.pl to create DMCP installer files.
Copy build results to \\martin\archive\pv\TestCenter\4.10\Engineering_Builds\integration\BUILDVERSION
Jenkins Node(s): spccalengec01, spccalpvxpvm-01, spccalengec02

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The release type tag displayed in STC GUI Help-About and splash screen. Available option are: - Alpha - Beta - RELEASE (no release type tag will be displayed in the GUI if set to 'RELEASE')

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: del BLL_changelist*.txt del UI_changelist*.txt del /f Win64ResultsReporter.tar del /f Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz exit /B 0

echo extracting TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_UI% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz --directory=bin/Release echo extracting STAKCommands.beta.Windows.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_UI% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install STAKCommands.beta.Windows.tar.gz --directory=STAKCommands
REM 0-padding build number SET FULLVER=00%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 if %BLL_BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 9 SET FULLVER=0%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 if %BLL_BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 99 SET FULLVER=%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 echo FULLVER is %FULLVER%
xcopy /S /I /E /Y %WORKSPACE%\STAKCommands\STAKCommands\*.* M:\TestCenter\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%\Engineering_Builds\GUI_BLL\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER%\STAKCommands

REM 0-padding build number SET FULLVER=00%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 if %BLL_BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 9 SET FULLVER=0%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 if %BLL_BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 99 SET FULLVER=%BLL_BUILD_NUMBER%6 echo FULLVER is %FULLVER%
xcopy /S /I /E /Y %WORKSPACE%\framework\automation\scripting\stc\SampleScripts\*.* M:\TestCenter\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%\Engineering_Builds\GUI_BLL\%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER%\SampleScripts
REM downloading webhelp files from Artifactory del /f /q TestCenter_WebHelp.tar* ServerManager_WebHelp.tar* EnhancedResults_WebHelp.tar* curl -o TestCenter_WebHelp.tar.gz https://artifactory.cal.ci.spirentcom.com/artifactory/STC/webhelp/%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%/TestCenter_WebHelp.tar.gz curl -o ServerManager_WebHelp.tar.gz https://artifactory.cal.ci.spirentcom.com/artifactory/STC/webhelp/%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%/ServerManager_WebHelp.tar.gz curl -o EnhancedResults_WebHelp.tar.gz https://artifactory.cal.ci.spirentcom.com/artifactory/STC/webhelp/%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%/EnhancedResults_WebHelp.tar.gz

echo extracting Win32ResultsReporter.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_RESULTS_REPORTER_WINDOWS% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install Win32ResultsReporter.tar.gz --directory=framework/ui/resultsanalysis/dist
p4 info set
c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --updaterrjarversion=yes
echo extracting Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz file from job %COPYARTIFACT_BUILD_NUMBER_RESULTS_REPORTER_WINDOWS% python framework\tools\buildUtil\package.py --install Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz --directory=framework/ui/resultsanalysis/windows_dist/windows_x64
p4 info set
c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --updaterrjarversion64=yes
echo zip Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz del /f /q Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz
7z a -ttar Win64ResultsReporter.tar %WORKSPACE%\framework\ui\resultsanalysis\windows_dist\windows_x64\* 7z a -tgzip Win64ResultsReporter.tar.gz Win64ResultsReporter.tar
c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --runcopywinrr64tomartin=yes

REM -- not required for 4.77 -- copy \\storage.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\builds\stcweb\windows\stc-rest-win32.tar.gz stc-rest-win32.tar.gz REM -- not required for 4.77 -- 7z x stc-rest-win32.tar.gz REM -- not required for 4.77 -- 7z x -y -o"%WORKSPACE%\bin\Release" stc-rest-win32.tar
REM set URL=https://jenkins.oriondev.net/job/stc-web/lastSuccessfulBuild/s3/download/stc-rest-win32.tar.gz REM python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --downloadfilefromurl=%URL% del /f /q stc-rest-win32.tar 7z x stc-rest-win32.tar.gz 7z x -y -o"%WORKSPACE%\bin\Release" stc-rest-win32.tar
REM -- Process api navigator --- copy api-navigator.exe %WORKSPACE%\bin\Release\api-navigator.exe
REM -- Process OpenHLT --- del /f /q oht-rest-win32*.tar 7z x oht-rest-win32.tar.gz 7z x -y -o"%WORKSPACE%\bin\Release" oht-rest-win32.tar

cd %WORKSPACE%\bin\release SET DEPENDENT_JOB_NAME=%JOB_NAME% SET P4USER=scmbuild SET P4PORT=perforce.spirentcom.com:1666 copy c:\jenkins-rel\release_bll_windows_packaging_new\bin\Release\NTAF\tool\Stc420Publication.xml c:\jenkins-rel\release_bll_windows_packaging_new\bin\Release\NTAF\tool\Stc500Publication.xml /y
c:\python27\python %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\Scripts\ci_run_jenkins_steps.py --createpropfile=yes --runcimaketarballs=no --runsetver=yes --updateilversionxml=yes --updatereleasetag=yes --updatepkgindextcl=yes --updatespirenttestcentertcl=yes --updatestclibtcl=yes --updategemspecversion=yes --updatentafxml=yes --updatehltapiversion=yes --updatemagellanversion=yes
perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% STC_APP_COPY_ONLY
del /f /q %WORKSPACE%\Installer rd /s /q %WORKSPACE%\Installer mkdir %WORKSPACE%\Installer
perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% COMPILE_FORTHOT
perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% PACKAGE_P2_INSTALLER
perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% COPY_P2_INSTALLER rem exit /B 0

setlocal EnableExtensions DisableDelayedExpansion
set branch=%STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION% set release=\\devops-nas-1.cal.ci.spirentcom.com\builds\NoCrypto\%branch%\window\Release
rd /s /q "%release%"
if not exist %release% ( mkdir %release% )
copy %WORKSPACE%\TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz %release%\TestCenter.Windows.no_version.tar.gz /y copy %WORKSPACE%\STAKCommands.beta.Windows.tar.gz %release%\STAKCommands.beta.Windows.tar.gz /y
